可怜的家伙，好惨……大家不要买车了！ by Acneska Earlier today in Laizhou, China, a speeding car lost control when its tire unexpectedly burst and flew off the bridge. Of four passengers inside, three died landing on the highway below, while one was stopped from falling over by the barrier. Whether he was really lucky not to die is debatable, seeing as he was … Continue reading "Fatal Accident in China Leaves Man Impaled on Bridge Barrier" 《Fatal Accident in China Leaves Man Impaled on Bridge Barrier》源地址 http://ift.tt/2bERBO3
